name: maybe I can wake up by force (woodychucky)
name_original: maybe I can wake up by force (woodychucky)
description:
This game is in a very early stage of development but I wanted to upload it here anyway. At the moment the game is kind of empty and dismal but that will change in the future. 

Please tell me what you think and inform me if you encounter any problems of any kind. This is my very first unity game and I did all the models and coding by my self. All the other credits are to find in the game menu.

Oh yeah, there is not much to tell about the story at the moment (spoiler alert: there isn't any). I planned the story to be a realy generaic scenario. You play a guy that had an accident and now he is in a state between sleep, coma and brain death. So you have to stay alive and try to wake up by force. I mainly choosed this scenario so I can do what ever I want and don't have to be worried about any part of the game doesn't make sense.

Oh and ofcourse headphones are most recommend since this game works alot with 3D sounds.

So enjoy and I'm looking forward to your feedback!
